titles.title: JP587 Oi, oi, we are gonna praise the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It's sometimes hard to understand
That the God who made the earth and man
Would point a finger down from heaven and shout:
"Hey you! I love you.
Hey you! I love you,
Hey you, you! I love you" but it's true!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Oi, oi, we are gonna praise the Lord
Oi, oi, we are gonna praise the Lord
Oi, oi, we are gonna praise the Lord
He's an exciting, powerising, c-colossal
Humungous-mungous God
